text.title: Create a Literary and Arts Magazine

head.s: Create a Literary and Arts Magazine

p.s: Ever thought about creating a literary and arts magazine for your high school or college ?
If so , this step by step process for creating a literary and arts magazine will be very useful to you .

item.s: Create a website or portal for works to be submitted .
Decide on content ( poems , short stories , art etc ) .
This may include hiring an IT person to help set up the site .
The IT person should include procedures for authors and artists to submit their works , along with username accounts for each member of the review team .
A reviewing and scoring system should also be created .
Get a group of people together to help create the magazine .
This may be in the form of a club or actual class .
Make sure to assign important positions to members of the Magazine team such as Editor in Chief , Assistant Editor , etc.
Once a team is assembled , start promotion !
Design flyers/posters to put up around your community or school campus .
Also think about creating various social media accounts for the magazine such as Facebook , Instagram , and Twitter .
This will get the word out to possible authors and artists who are interested in submitting their work .
Do n't forget to include a deadline for submissions and a link to the magazine 's website on the flyers and social media accounts !
That way potential authors and artists will know exactly where to submit their work .
Once works are in , start reviewing !
Make sure to give you and your team a couple weeks to do this .
Review each piece thoroughly so that it is given proper consideration .
Meet frequently with your club or class to discuss works with the highest scores .
These will probably be the ones chosen for publication !
While reviewing works , get in touch with a graphic designer who can create the cover and template for the magazine .
He or she is essential in bringing your vision for the magazine to life !
Also get an idea of the cost for printing and how many copies need to be made .
An experienced printing company will be needed for this .
Make final decisions !
Choose the works that will be published in the magazine .
Notify the authors and artists and possibly request brief personal biographies to be included in the magazine .
Have the editing team look over the chosen works for any grammatical errors .
Works should be proofread multiple times by each editor to ensure little to no mistakes .
Send out final drafts of the short stories and poems , author bios , and editor 's note to the graphic designer .
He or she will place these into the finished magazine template .
Send to print !
Allow 1-2 weeks for the magazine to be printed prior to publication .
Celebrate !
This step is optional , but a nice party for the magazine team , authors , and artists is always a plus !
